=== Who am I ===
My name is Anders Joergensen, and I live in Aarhus Denmark, and have been using Linux since 1995. I really think Ubuntu is what the Linux world needs. I mean - My mother can install it!<<BR>>
I currently working as a freelance consultant for Tietoenater Telebit, formerly Ericsson Telebit A/S, but have worked for both IBM and Nokia earlier.<<BR>>
At the moment I am coding C, Python and Perl, but I have also done quite a bit of operations work earlier.<<BR>>
I am off cause running my freelance consultancy company completely on OpenSource software :-)
